message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13500.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $12750.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12250. Would you be willing to accept that price?
I understand that you're still looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll offer the product to you for $13000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11500?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $12800.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12200?
I understand that you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $12500.
I really appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm at my absolute limit. Would you be willing to meet me at $12000?
